fields.title: Spaghetti Carbonara
fields.description: A classic Italian pasta dish made with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and pepper.
fields.ingredients: Spaghetti, Eggs, Parmesan cheese, Pancetta, Black pepper
fields.instructions: 1. Cook spaghetti. 2. Fry pancetta. 3. Mix eggs and cheese. 4. Combine all and serve.

fields.title: Chicken Curry
fields.description: A spicy and flavorful chicken curry with a blend of aromatic spices.
fields.ingredients: Chicken, Curry powder, Coconut milk, Onion, Garlic
fields.instructions: 1. Saut√© onions and garlic. 2. Add chicken and curry powder. 3. Stir in coconut milk. 4. Simmer and serve.
